item.description:
We'll meet at the Au Bon Pain in Harvard Square, walk down to Central, and then up north into Cambridge to check out the side streets for a change.

I'll map out a proposed route before the meetup, but if anyone has ideas, please share in the comments when you RSVP. The Beacon Hill walk was well improvised with Sue pointing out a cool tiny street that I had no idea about.

I'm going to try something new with this meetup - I'm putting no limit on the # of Yes's, but no Maybe's. If you're undecided, just sign up at the last minute. I've been using my phone to check the website for RSVPs instead of printing out a list, so it'll be up to the minute. I will also post my cell # in the comments before I leave to meet up. In the past I only usually get 1 out of 10 or so Maybe's which is why I'm trying this.
item.how_to_find_us: See my profile pic and I'll email my cell # to the rsvps.
item.name: Harvard, Central, and Cambridge walk
